refnamediv.refpurpose: Initialize empty state for a given operating system

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Initializes an new state for an operating system. Ensures that the core subdirectories of /var (/tmp, /lib, /run, and /lock) exist and initialize the given OSNAME as OSTree root. Each deployment location is comprised of a single shared var and a set of deployments (chroots).

refentry.refsect1:
Example
$ ostree admin os-init gnome-ostree ostree/deploy/gnome-ostree initialized as OSTree root
